title: Impact of hole-transport layer materials on the field-induced degradation of p-i-n perovskite solar cells
content:
Sustainable Energy Fuels, 2024, 8,997-1003
DOI: 10.1039/D3SE01458D, Paper
Victoria V. Ozerova, Nikita A. Emelianov, Lyubov A. Frolova, Yuri S. Fedotov, Sergey I. Bredikhin, Sergey M. Aldoshin, Pavel A. Troshin
The choice of hole-transport materials (HTMs) has a strong impact on electric field-induced degradation of perovskite solar cells (PSCs). Rational design of HTMs is necessary to make PSCs sufficiently stable for the targeted practical applications.
